lemming.lemma

Interface ILemmaDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDao<Lemma>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LemmaDao

    public interface ILemmaDao
extends IDao<Lemma>
    Defines a lemma DAO by extending interface IDao.
